https://tmrev.io/movie/1041053-Despair in the Vinyl Row 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/eJ2VU1Uk3ceRLb8WVf1Ts7M2sfw.jpg Two friends debate the condition of the modern music scene, while searching for a prized bootleg vinyl record. While searching for it, Joe laments his anger with the "posers" that pollute his once gate-kept community. Shane quickly attempts to bring him back down to Earth. Despair in the Vinyl Row
